trends: There have been no other sightings in Dalton Gardens
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting Detailsi was looking up at the night sky and was looking at the strangest star when it sundennly got biger until it dissapeard and was moving it got supper close and then it shined a light at me.like a spot light of some sort.i was alone and my nighbors where on vacation.so i went in side thgen came back a minuite later and there was a ghole in the ground that wasnt there befor and something was in it i dont know what it is but this is just wierd.
Summary: Fast, close, came out of star.
